name: Subscape
description:
After escaping from a collapsing dimension, you find yourself in a world that is also falling apart. As you explore to understand what's happening, you discover new powers that enable you to open portals to other dimensions. Dive deeper into the mystery of these portals and the dimensions they lead to, uncovering secrets and facing unknown dangers.

HOW TO PLAY:

  • AD or Left Stick to move
  • Hold J or Right Trigger to open the portal
  • Press K or Left Trigger to close the portal

This is my 2016 game jam project, now updated with small tweaks and fixes. While I originally decided not to continue development after the release of "Unbound: Worlds Apart" with a similar concept, I'm open to new feedback and inspiration.

Music, SFX: https://purelygrey.com/
